description.value: Regeneration does not function while the thief of life is exposed to sunlight.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+20 vs AC; 2d8+7 damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+20 vs AC; 2d8+7 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The thief of life makes a bite attack and two claw attacks. The claw attacks must target two different enemies.

Charm

Immediate Reaction

Ranged 10

Trigger: When attacked, recharges when first bloodied

+18 vs Will; the target is dazed and is pulled 5 squares at the start of its turn (save ends both). This attack does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Encounter ✦ Healing

Standard

Close blast 5

+18 vs Reflex; (+20 against bloodied targets)2d8+6 damage, and the thief of life regains 30 hit points. It regains only 30 hit points regardless of how many targets are hit. Miss: Half damage, and the thief of life does not regain hit points.

Encounter ✦ Healing

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The thief of life's breath weapon recharges, and the thief of life uses it immediately.

At-Will ✦ Teleportation

Move

The thief of life teleports 20 squares. It must end its move adjacent to a bloodied enemy.

Encounter ✦ Polymorph

Standard

The vampire lord becomes insubstantial and gains a fly speed of 12, but cannot make attacks. The vampire lord can remain in mist form for up to 1 hour or end the effect as a minor action.

Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Evil

Passive Perception 21 | Insight 21
